title: If there was NO queue, were customers greeted within 10 seconds / acceptable time
If there was a queue, were customers greeted within 20 seconds / acceptable time
If there was a queue, were you quoted an accurate wait time and provided a menu?
Server offered to take the order within 2 minutes of your having been seated or buzzed
Was the complete food order served in a timely manner?
Station holder checked for the feedback within 3 mins of starters being served
Manager on duty checked for the feedback within 4 mins of main course being served
Dishes cleared within 7 minutes of guests finishing their meals or as required during the meal
Bill promptly presented within 4 mins of requesting
Staff took the payment at the table and returned with change or receipt within 5 minutes
Vacated tables cleared and cleaned within 4 minutes
